example.name: autogen1
example.text: Rumors to the contrary have been that it would be a six billion mark issue , or that the last Bund , a 7 % issue due October 1999 , would be increased by two billion marks .
example.arg: that it would be a six billion mark issue , or that the last Bund , a 7 % issue due October 1999 , would be increased by two billion marks

example.name: autogen2
example.text: Dictates of good sense to the contrary not withstanding , the general inclination was to believe that the disturbance would be brief and that ball would be played .
example.arg: the general inclination was to believe that the disturbance would be brief and that ball would be played
